MERGE INTO reply_tb USING DUAL on (#{reply_no} > 0)
-- 기존 댓글이 있을 때 댓글 갱신 UPDATE SET reply_content = #{reply_content}, reply_updatedate = sysdate WHERE reply_no = #{reply_no} AND user_no = ( SELECT user_no FROM user_tb WHERE user_id = #{user_id} )
-- 기존 댓글 없을 때 댓글 추가 INSERT INTO reply_tb( board_no, reply_group, reply_dept, reply_content, user_no ) VALUES ( #{board_no}, #{reply_group}, #{reply_dept}, #{reply_content}, ( SELECT user_no FROM user_tb WHERE user_id = #{user_id} ) )
